Articles.Content:
Hey there! These are the new space drones I have made! Thanks for viewing or downloading!

Onyx Air 4

Thanks for looking!

Onyx Altair-
Sorry for such a bad lay out guys, does anyone know how to attach things in a spoiler? Thanks
If you don\'t know how to post pictures under spoilers, then don\'t do it. Anyways, by the looks of it, it seems it\'s not very stable. What\'s the take-off speed? Sorry for being so mean to you :\'(

Swift, that was kinda mean. Anyways, you have to get your picture, upload it to Imgur. Then, click on the picture again, and copy the link that\'s at the top of the screen. Next, get back here, add to the spioler (withblahblahblah.com/extension/blah being the link) And hopefully, you should be good to go!
Well its not really built to take off its supposed to be a glider like the X37, but It can re-enter at high speeds. I would recommend the Kw PLF set to put it inside
